title: Acai Cafe - Island Veggie
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Hawaiian
description: Island Veggie re-branded to Acai Cafe in 2016; the concept and menu is the same. Hawaiian cafe in a casual atmosphere at 東京都渋谷区広尾５－３－９ CASビル１F. Breakfast served before 11am, and primarily a soy-meat burger fast food joint after 11am. Note that honey is used. Eat-in until 5:30pm, then take-out only.
